alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued May 13 at 12:49PM MDT until May 13 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The Arco Desert and Upper and Lower Snake River Plain including Mud Lake, INL, Craters of the Moon, Idaho Falls, Rexburg, St. Anthony, Pocatello, Blackfoot, American Falls, Shelley, and Fort Hall. * WHEN...Continuing until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Blow dust may reduce visibility. Rough chop on area lakes may create hazardous boating conditions particularly for small watercraft.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lower Snake River Plain; Upper Snake River Plain
